headline: Ohio redistricting process falters as panel hits ‘impasse’
author: Associated Press
sentences: COLUMBUS — Republicans on the Ohio Redistricting Commission declared defeat in their attempts to redraw state legislative maps in the face of a court-set deadline Thursday.
They said they saw no path forward that would both comply with orders from the state’s high court and meet the state’s Constitution.
The two Democrats on the seven-member Redistricting Commission rejected the GOP line of argument, after presenting a version o ...
